description: Number of symmetric nonnegative integer 8 X 8 matrices with sum of elements equal to 4*n, under action of dihedral group D_4.
references: Y. Teranishi, Linear Diophantine equations and invriant theory of matrices, in Commutative algebra and combinatorics (Kyoto, 1985), pp. 259-275, Adv. Stud. Pure Math., 11, North-Holland, Amsterdam, 1987. (See p. 273.)
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
crossrefs: Column k=4 of A210391. - _Alois P. Heinz_, Mar 22 2012
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, May 14 2000
